items.title: feat.fm
items.description: feat.fm gives you live, interactive concerts to you whereever you are. Meet fans, interact and support your favorite musicians.

items.title: Everything is Fashion
items.description: A THREE.js WebGL demo made for Solskogen 2015. Second place in the newschool demo compo. Made using our demotool nin.

items.title: Demolicious
items.description: Demolicous is a general purpose SIMT inspired computer. It's made from scratch in the subject TDT4295 on NTNU, the fall 2014. It's the first of its kind in this project to utilize HDMI to display graphics on an HDMI enabled screen. The computer architecture is implemented on an FPGA. A custom PCB is made for the system as a whole.

items.title: Inakuwa Oasis
items.description: A THREE.js WebGL demo made for Solskogen 2014. Won the newschool compo. First showcase of our demotool nin

items.title: Cute Animals Inc
items.description: This game was made for the 48 hour gaming competition Bacon Game Jam. The theme for the game was rainbows. You protect the pot of gold at the end of the rainbow from monsters...sort of. It ended 3rd of 97 submissions.

items.title: Wikipendium
items.description: Compendiums freely edited by everyone. The goal is to offer freely available and updated compendiums for all courses. Currently most of the compendiums are for courses offered at NTNU.

items.title: TUNL-MNTN-WTER
items.description: A THREE.js WebGL demo made for Solskogen 2013. It got the 5th place in the PC demo compo. You can read more about it on Pouët.net.

items.title: Kinkdemo
items.description: A WebGL demo made for fun before the BEKK RoboCup 2013 challenge. It's written in javascript using THREE.js

items.title: HONEYCOMB
items.description: A THREE.js WebGL demo made for Solskogen 2012. It won the web demo compo. You can read more about it on Pouët.net.
